configuration.name: jiraEpic

configuration.title: Start Date of MMF
configuration.description: Jira Epic Key to create burndown and burnup charts for. Example: DEVEX-1664.

configuration.title: End Date of MMF
configuration.description: Jira Epic Key to create burndown and burnup charts for. Example: DEVEX-1664.
